name: Nori
long_description:
Nori takes *all* of your health data—Apple Health, Oura, Whoop, Peloton, nutrition apps, Garmin, MyChart, blood tests from Function Health, Superpower—all feeding your personal health AI.

With Nori, you get health advice that's personalized to you, practical and achievable, and based on proven, evidence-backed approaches.

Who it’s for: People who want weight loss, better energy, or faster recovery—starting with iOS users
one_liner: Mint.com for Health—All your health data + personal health coach
